item.title: AutoMapper 14.0 Released
item.description: I pushed out version 14.0 (!) of AutoMapper over the weekend:Release notesNuGetThis release targets .NET 8 (up from .NET 6 from the previous release). It's mainly a bug fix release, with some quality-of-life improvements in configuration validation where we gather up all the possible validation Link to article: https://www.jimmybogard.com/automapper-14-0-released/
